language.name: java
language.title: Java
language.description: Evaluates a Java (Java compiled once at runtime) expression.
language.label: language

id.description: Sets the id of this node

expression.description: The expression value in your chosen language syntax

preCompile.label: advanced
preCompile.description: Whether the expression should be pre compiled once during initialization phase. If this is turned off, then the expression is reloaded and compiled on each evaluation.

singleQuotes.label: advanced
singleQuotes.description: Whether single quotes can be used as replacement for double quotes. This is convenient when you need to work with strings inside strings.

resultType.description: Sets the class of the result type (type from output)

trim.label: advanced
trim.description: Whether to trim the value to remove leading and trailing whitespaces and line breaks
